roleset.name: check (for), examine

role.descr: test result; DO NOT USE THIS ARGUMENT FOR THYME AMR ANNOTATION

example.name: test-v: just transitive
example.text: A Toto spokesman said the toilet not only tests blood pressure , pulse and urine , it also stores the data for up to 130 days .

example.name: test-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Only 4 % of Missouri small businesses surveyed say they 've tested an employee or applicant for drug or alcohol use ... .

example.name: test-v: with arg3
example.text: but now it seems that the gold medal is more important ; the gold medal becomes the totem for showing a national image and reputation and the token of sports officials ' achievements -- thus , there certainly could not be an accident in the food supply , especially an accident caused by athletes eating pork outside , which may make athletes test positive for clenbuterol .

example.name: testing-n: All args
example.text: The clinic 's testing of the patient for strep throat did not yield a definitive diagnosis .

example.name: test-n: autogen1
example.text: It did n't run a production test on the three discovery wells itdrilled in the field , which is about 1.6 miles from the IntanField , because the wells are similar to others drilled at itsIntan and Widuri fields

propbank.arg: on the three discovery wells itdrilled in the field , which is about 1.6 miles from the IntanField

example.name: test-n: NP only
example.text: viability tests for fetuses 19 weeks and older

example.name: test-n: Infinitival complement as arg 2
example.text: They are designing some sophisticated tests to look for the Hadron particle .

propbank.arg: to look for the Hadron particle

example.name: test-n: "of" PP complement as arg2
example.text: The young man did not think he could pass the test of loyalty demanded by the mafia don .

example.name: test-n: Figurative
example.text: This old garden hoe has withstood the test of time .

roleset.note: TEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'test' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. VerbNet class investigate-35.4. (from test.01-v)
TEST-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry test.01, OntoNotes sense grouping test.01, test.02; maps to VN class investigate-35.4. Framed by Claire (from test.01-n)
